hanzi-su-wiki:
穀

Значения

Зерно

Мнемоника

Пять видов зерновых. Имеют оболочку 冖, растут в почве, а их зерно 禾 обмолачивается 殳.

Варианты

穀, 谷

heisig_chinese_memo: There are different cereals in different parts of the world. Japan has samurai cereal. Great Britain has Crowned Wheat ... the United States and Russia have Missile cereals.
heisig_constituent: cereals, samurai, crown, wheat, cereal, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: There are different cereals in different parts of the world. Japan has samurai cereal. Great Britain has Crowned Wheat ... the United States and Russia have Missile cereals.
koohiiStory2: The samurai crowns wheat as the best cereal, and blows all others up with missiles (he´s a cereal killer).
jp_example_words: 穀物(こくもつ): grain, cereal, corn
WaniKani_Radicals: 士, 冖, 禾, 殳
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A samurai hits the foreheads of grains with his weapon so the grains will pop off and into his mouth. He doesn't want to kill the plants, so he's just skimming the grain's foreheads so they'll fall off and he can eat them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the samurai taking out his weapon and spinning in a lightning fast circle. The forehead grains pop off and come raining into his open mouth.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Phew, all of this grain is making the samurai thirsty, so he reaches in his bag and pulls out an ice cold, refreshing Coke (こく).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: These grains aren't even cooked, they're just hard and raw, so the Coke really helps wash them down.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 殻 (から、カク скорлупа, панцирь, кора), 毅 (つよい、キ、ギ решительность).
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 几 (стол), 又 (опять), 士 (воин), 殳 (удар), 禾 (ость колоса)
Ru_trainchinese:
gǔ: (графема) зерно, крупа
gǔ: (графема) добрый, хороший; официальная зарплата
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the samurai (士) covers (冖) the grain (禾) with his lance shaft (殳) and makes cereal
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: There are different cereals in different parts of the world. Japan has samurai cereal. Great Britain has Crowned Wheat ... the United States and Russia have Missile cereals.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " He ", " 𣪊 " sound. The original meaning is the general term for crops and grains. "Said Wen": "Gu, continued also, the general name of Baigu. Conghe, 𣪊 sound." Such as "Book of Rites. Song Lixia: "The year is fierce, the valley does not climb, the monarch does not sacrifice the lungs, the horse does not eat the valley, the road does not remove, the sacrifice does not the county." "Mencius. "Liang Hui Wang": "If you don't violate the farming season, you can't eat the grain."

In ancient times, grain was used as salary, so " grain " can also mean salary. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Gu, Lu also." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Tianbao": "Tianbao Ding'er, Bierjian Valley." Mao Chuan: "Jian, Fu. Valley, Lu." "Xunzi. King Domination: "The body is so lost but calm and restful and not happy, but the heart is good but not good."

" Valley " means nurturing and nurturing. "Guang Ya. "Shi Gu Yi": "Gu, raise also." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Futian": "I will introduce you to the millet, and I will use the valley to my lady." "Warring States Policy. "Qi Ce Six": "It is the order to ask the people to be hungry and cold, and to harvest the valley." Bao Biao's note: "The valley is still nourished."

" Valley " means survival and alive. Such as "Poetry. Wang Feng. Cart": "The valley is in different rooms, and death is in the same cave." Kong Yingdashu: "Birth is living in different rooms, and death is buried in the same cave." "Book of Later Han. "The Biography of Zhang Heng": "The past dreams are in Muhexi, the Gaogang of Gu Kunlun."

" Valley " can express goodness. "Er Ya. Interpretation on "The Analects of Confucius." "Tab": "Study for three years, it is not easy to get the valley." Ancient princes called themselves "no valley", which means badness and self-humility. "Lao Tzu. Chapter Thirty-Nine": "So expensive is based on low quality, and below high is based. So the king says that he is lonely and widowed. Isn't it based on low quality?"

" Gu " also means a child. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Pian Thumb": "Zang and Gu, the two of the two men and the shepherd, and their sheep will be destroyed." "Xunzi. "Li Lun": "A gentleman takes Zanggu with a heart of rebellion, and he is still ashamed, but because of the fact that he is prosperous!" Yang Yao's note: "The slave says Zang, and the ruzi says Gu."
humanum_short_description_en: From " He ", " 𣪊 " sound. The original meaning is the general term for crops and grains.
humanum_full_description:
從「禾」，「𣪊」聲。本義是莊稼糧食的總稱。《說文》：「穀，續也，百穀之總名。从禾，𣪊聲。」如《禮記．曲禮下》：「歲凶，年穀不登，君膳不祭肺，馬不食穀，馳道不除，祭事不縣。」《孟子．梁惠王上》：「不違農時，穀不可勝食也。」

　　古代以穀物作俸祿，故「穀」又可表示俸祿。《爾雅．釋言》：「穀，祿也。」如《詩．小雅．天保》：「天保定爾，俾爾戩穀。」毛傳：「戩，福。穀，祿。」《荀子．王霸》：「形體好佚而安重閒靜莫愉焉，心好利而穀祿莫厚焉。」

　　「穀」表示養、養育。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「穀，養也。」如《詩．小雅．甫田》：「以介我稷黍，以穀我士女。」《戰國策．齊策六》：「乃布令求百姓之饑寒者，收穀之。」鮑彪注：「穀，猶養。」

　　「穀」表示生存、活著。如《詩．王風．大車》：「穀則異室，死則同穴。」孔穎達疏：「生則異室而居，死則同穴而葬。」《後漢書．張衡列傳》：「發昔夢於木禾兮，穀崑崙之高岡。」

　　「穀」可表示善。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「穀，善也。」如《論語．泰伯》：「三年學，不至於穀，不易得也。」古代諸侯自稱「不穀」，意謂不善，乃自謙之詞。《老子．三十九章》：「故貴以賤為本，高以下為基。是以侯王自謂孤寡不穀，此非以賤為本耶？」

　　「穀」還表示小孩。如《莊子．駢拇》：「臧與穀，二人相與牧羊而俱亡其羊。」《荀子．禮論》：「君子以倍叛之心接臧穀，猶且羞之，而況以事其所隆親乎！」楊倞注：「奴曰臧，孺子曰穀。」
humanum_short_description: 從「禾」，「𣪊」聲。本義是莊稼糧食的總稱。

HSK 6: 谷,穀
穀穀RS corn, grain, cereal, lucky
  • cereal 禾 with casing 㱿
(Simplified: 谷)
Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • ⿳ Above to middle and below
        • 士 [ shì ] scholar, gentleman; soldier
        • 冖 [ mì ] cover
        • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
      • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 殳 [ shū ] tool, weapon
①用本義。［例］無障谷。——《公羊傳·僖公三年》。［例］川穀徑復。——《楚辭·招魂》。［例］含谿懷谷。——《文選·左思·蜀都賦》。［例］當餘之從師也，負篋曳屣，行深山巨谷中。——明·宋濂《送東陽馬生序》。［合］向斜谷；裂谷；山谷；河谷；峽谷；幽谷；谷口(兩山之間的入口)；谷水(山谷的水)。
②兩山之間的水流。［例］陽穀皆入汶，陰谷皆入濟。——清·姚鼐《惜抱軒全集》卷十四。［合］谷飲(汲谷水而飲)；谷泉(山谷間所出的泉水)。
③泛指水流。［例］爲大川廣谷之不可濟，於是利爲舟楫。——《墨子》。
④水流會聚的地方。［合］谷王(江海的別名。以其能容百穀之水，故稱)。
⑤井中容水之處。［合］谷鮒(指井中蛤蟆)。
⑥中醫學名詞。［合］谷谿(肢體肌肉之間相互接觸的縫隙或凹陷部位，爲經絡氣血輸注出入的處所)；穀道(指直腸到肛門的一部分；肛門)。
⑦古代道家用語。［合］谷牝(猶穀神)。
⑧通“穀。莊稼和糧食的總稱。［合］谷董羹(一種雜煮的飲食)；五穀(莊稼和糧食的總稱)；百穀(糧食的總稱)。
⑨通“鞫”。困窮。引申爲困境。［例］人亦有言，進退維谷。——《詩·大雅·桑柔》。［合］進退維谷(形容處境非常困難)。
⑩姓氏。［合］谷那(複姓)。
(Simplified: 谷)

穀物(こくもつ): grain, cereal, corn

從「 禾 」，「 𣪊 」聲。本義是莊稼糧食的總稱。《說文》：「穀，續也，百穀之總名。从禾，𣪊聲。」如《禮記．曲禮下》：「歲凶，年穀不登，君膳不祭肺，馬不食穀，馳道不除，祭事不縣。」《孟子．梁惠王上》：「不違農時，穀不可勝食也。」 古代以穀物作俸祿，故「 穀 」又可表示俸祿。《爾雅．釋言》：「穀，祿也。」如《詩．小雅．天保》：「天保定爾，俾爾戩穀。」毛傳：「戩，福。穀，祿。」《荀子．王霸》：「形體好佚而安重閒靜莫愉焉，心好利而穀祿莫厚焉。」 「 穀 」表示養、養育。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「穀，養也。」如《詩．小雅．甫田》：「以介我稷黍，以穀我士女。」《戰國策．齊策六》：「乃布令求百姓之饑寒者，收穀之。」鮑彪注：「穀，猶養。」 「 穀 」表示生存、活著。如《詩．王風．大車》：「穀則異室，死則同穴。」孔穎達疏：「生則異室而居，死則同穴而葬。」《後漢書．張衡列傳》：「發昔夢於木禾兮，穀崑崙之高岡。」 「 穀 」可表示善。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「穀，善也。」如《論語．泰伯》：「三年學，不至於穀，不易得也。」古代諸侯自稱「不穀」，意謂不善，乃自謙之詞。《老子．三十九章》：「故貴以賤為本，高以下為基。是以侯王自謂孤寡不穀，此非以賤為本耶？」 「 穀 」還表示小孩。如《莊子．駢拇》：「臧與穀，二人相與牧羊而俱亡其羊。」《荀子．禮論》：「君子以倍叛之心接臧穀，猶且羞之，而況以事其所隆親乎！」楊倞注：「奴曰臧，孺子曰穀。」

穀字的基本解释

穀
gǔ
见“谷1”③④。

穀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》古禄切，入屋，見。］
亦作“糓1”。
(1)粮食作物总称。古代经传常以百谷、九谷、六谷、五谷称之。
(2)官俸。古人常以谷物计禄。
(3)赡养；养着。
(4)生；活着。
(5)善；良。
(6)讣告。
(7)见“穀産”。
(8)古城名。故址在今山东省平阴县西南。春秋齐地。位于齐国西境，为当时交通要地。秦代称为谷城。
(9)古水名。在今河南省境内。
(10)古水名。在今安徽省、江苏省境内。
[②]［gòu］
［《集韻》居候切，去候，見。］
通“1”。
(1)小孩。
(2)古代楚语谓乳。

穀字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穀； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页858第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古祿切，音谷。【說文】續也。百穀之總名。从禾，㱿聲。【長箋】穀有穅秕，故从㱿。【書·洪範】百穀用成。【禮·月令】孟秋農乃登穀。【周禮·天官·大宰】三農生九穀。【註】鄭司農云：九穀，黍，稷，秫，稻，麻，大小豆，大小麥。一說九穀無秫大麥，而有粱苽。又【天官膳夫】食用六穀。【註】黍，稷，粱，麥，苽，稌。又【天官疾醫】五穀養其病。【註】麻，黍，稷，麥，豆。【酉陽雜俎】九穀，黍稷稻粱，三豆二麥。【爾雅翼】梁者，黍稷之總名。稻者，漑種之總名。菽者，衆豆之總名。三穀各二十種，爲六十，蔬果之屬，助穀各二十種，凡百穀。又【星經】八穀星，主黍，稷，稻，粱，麻，菽，麥，烏麻，星明則俱熟。　又【爾雅·釋詁】穀，善也。【書·洪範】旣富方穀。【詩·?風】穀旦于差。【禮·曲禮】自稱曰不穀。【註】謙稱。　又生也。【詩·王風】穀則異室。【註】穀，生也。　又【爾雅·釋言】穀，祿也。【詩·小雅】俾爾戩穀。【註】穀，祿也。　又養也。【詩·小雅】以穀我士

穀字的起名意思

本义指庄稼和粮食的总称，也指善，良，古城名和构树。

Valley
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" Gu Lu cut, enter the house, see you. ]
Also known as "糓1".
(1) The general term for food crops. In ancient scriptures, it was often referred to as hundred grains, nine grains, six grains, and five grains.
(2) Official salary. The ancients used grains to calculate their income.
(3) Support; support.
(4) To live; to live.
(5) Kindness; Goodness.
(6) Obituaries.
(7) See "Grain Production".
(8) The name of the ancient city. The former site was in the southwest of Pingyin County, Shandong Province. Spring and autumn together. Located in the west of Qi State, it was an important place for transportation at that time. It was called Gucheng in the Qin Dynasty.
(9) Ancient water names. In today's Henan Province.
(10) Ancient water names. In today's Anhui Province and Jiangsu Province.
[②]［gòu］
["Jiyun" is waiting for cutting, going to wait, see. ]
Pass "1".
(1) Children.
(2) Ancient Chu language called milk.

Old glyph
Valley
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to the general term of crops and grain, but also refers to kindness, kindness, ancient city names and paper mulberry.
gǔ
вм. 谷 (злаки, зерновые)
Radicals: 士, 冖, 禾, 殳  (samurai, forehead, grain, weapon)
Meaning Mnemonic
A samurai hits the foreheads of grains with his weapon so the grains will pop off and into his mouth. He doesn't want to kill the plants, so he's just skimming the grain's foreheads so they'll fall off and he can eat them.
Picture the samurai taking out his weapon and spinning in a lightning fast circle. The forehead grains pop off and come raining into his open mouth.
Reading Mnemonic
Phew, all of this grain is making the samurai thirsty, so he reaches in his bag and pulls out an ice cold, refreshing Coke (こく).
These grains aren't even cooked, they're just hard and raw, so the Coke really helps wash them down.
